00072 static syx_bool _syx_cold_parse_class (SyxLexer *lexer);
00073 static SyxOop _syx_cold_parse_vars (SyxLexer *lexer, syx_bool capitalized);
00074 
00075 /* A cold parser */
00076 
00077 #define _IS_EXL_MARK(token) (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, "!"))
00078 
00079 static SyxOop
00080 _syx_cold_parse_vars (SyxLexer *lexer, syx_bool capitalized)
00081 {
00082   SyxOop vars;
00083   SyxOop vars_raw[256];
00084   syx_varsize vars_size;
00085   SyxToken token;
00086 
00087   /* Fetch variable names using the lexer */
00088   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00089   for (vars_size=0; token.type != SYX_TOKEN_END; vars_size++)
00090     {
00091       if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST)
00092         {
00093           syx_token_free (token);
00094           syx_error ("Expected names for variables\n");
00095         }
00096 
00097       if (capitalized && !isupper (token.value.string[0]))
00098         {
00099           syx_token_free (token);
00100           syx_error ("First letter must be uppercase\n");
00101         }
00102 
00103       vars_raw[vars_size] = syx_symbol_new (token.value.string);
00104       syx_token_free (token);
00105       token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00106     }
00107 
00108   /* Create the array */
00109   vars = syx_array_new_size (vars_size);
00110   /* Copy out of the stack */
00111   memcpy (SYX_OBJECT_DATA (vars), vars_raw, sizeof (SyxOop ) * vars_size);
00112 
00113   return vars;
00114 }
00115 
00116 static syx_bool
00117 _syx_cold_parse_class (SyxLexer *lexer)
00118 {
00119   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (lexer);
00120   SyxOop superclass, subclass;
00121   syx_string subclass_name;
00122   syx_bool existing_class = TRUE;
00123 
00124   SyxOop inst_vars, class_vars;
00125   SyxLexer *inst_vars_lexer, *class_vars_lexer;
00126   syx_varsize super_inst_vars_size;
00127   syx_int32 i;
00128 
00129   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST)
00130     {
00131       syx_error ("Expected a name constant\n");
00132       syx_token_free (token);
00133       return FALSE;
00134     }
00135 
00136   if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "nil"))
00137     superclass = syx_nil;
00138   else
00139     superclass = syx_globals_at (token.value.string);
00140   
00141   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00142   if (!(token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON && !strcmp (token.value.string, "subclass:")))
00143     {
00144       syx_token_free (token);
00145       syx_error ("Expected #subclass:\n");
00146       return FALSE;
00147     }
00148   syx_token_free (token);
00149 
00150   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00151   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_SYM_CONST)
00152     {
00153       syx_token_free (token);
00154       syx_error ("Expected a symbol constant\n");
00155       return FALSE;
00156     }
00157 
00158   subclass_name = syx_strdup (token.value.string);
00159   syx_token_free (token);
00160   subclass = syx_globals_at_if_absent (subclass_name, syx_nil);
00161 
00162   if (strcmp (subclass_name, "Object"))
00163     {
00164       if (SYX_IS_NIL (subclass))
00165         existing_class = FALSE;
00166       else
00167         {
00168           existing_class = TRUE;
00169           if (SYX_OOP_NE (SYX_CLASS_SUPERCLASS(subclass), superclass))
00170             {
00171               syx_array_remove (SYX_CLASS_SUBCLASSES (SYX_CLASS_SUPERCLASS (subclass)),
00172                                 subclass);
00173               SYX_CLASS_SUPERCLASS(subclass) = superclass;
00174               syx_array_add (SYX_CLASS_SUBCLASSES (superclass), subclass, TRUE);
00175 
00176               syx_array_remove (SYX_CLASS_SUBCLASSES (SYX_CLASS_SUPERCLASS(syx_object_get_class (subclass))),
00177                                 syx_object_get_class (subclass));
00178               SYX_CLASS_SUPERCLASS(syx_object_get_class (subclass)) = syx_object_get_class (superclass);
00179               syx_array_add (SYX_CLASS_SUBCLASSES (syx_object_get_class (superclass)),
00180                              syx_object_get_class (subclass), TRUE);
00181             }
00182         }
00183     }
00184 
00185   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00186   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON)
00187     {
00188       syx_token_free (token);
00189       syx_error ("Expected #instanceVariableNames:\n");
00190       return FALSE;
00191     }
00192   syx_token_free (token);
00193 
00194   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00195   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_STR_CONST)
00196     {
00197       syx_token_free (token);
00198       syx_error ("Expected a string as argument for #instanceVariableNames:\n");
00199       return FALSE;
00200     }
00201   inst_vars_lexer = syx_lexer_new (token.value.string);
00202 
00203   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00204   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON)
00205     {
00206       syx_token_free (token);
00207       syx_error ("Expected #classVariableNames:\n");
00208       return FALSE;
00209     }
00210   syx_token_free (token);
00211 
00212   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00213   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_STR_CONST)
00214     {
00215       syx_token_free (token);
00216       syx_error ("Expected a string as argument for #classVariableNames:\n");
00217       return FALSE;
00218     }
00219   class_vars_lexer = syx_lexer_new (token.value.string);
00220 
00221   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00222   if (!_IS_EXL_MARK (token))
00223     {
00224       syx_token_free (token);
00225       syx_error ("Class definition must terminate with an exlamation mark\n");
00226       return FALSE;
00227     }
00228   syx_token_free (token);
00229 
00230   if (!existing_class)
00231     {
00232       subclass = syx_class_new (superclass);
00233       SYX_CLASS_NAME(subclass) = syx_symbol_new (subclass_name);
00234       syx_globals_at_put (SYX_CLASS_NAME(subclass), subclass);
00235     }
00236   syx_free (subclass_name);
00237 
00238   /* Parse instance variables */
00239   inst_vars = _syx_cold_parse_vars (inst_vars_lexer, FALSE);
00240   syx_lexer_free (inst_vars_lexer, TRUE);
00241 
00242   /* Fetch superclass instanceSize */
00243   if (SYX_IS_NIL (superclass))
00244     super_inst_vars_size = 0;
00245   else
00246     super_inst_vars_size = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_CLASS_INSTANCE_SIZE (superclass));
00247 
00248   SYX_CLASS_INSTANCE_VARIABLES(subclass) = inst_vars;
00249   SYX_CLASS_INSTANCE_SIZE(subclass) = syx_small_integer_new (super_inst_vars_size
00250                                                              + SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE (inst_vars));
00251 
00252   /* Now parse class variables */
00253   class_vars = _syx_cold_parse_vars (class_vars_lexer, TRUE);
00254   syx_lexer_free (class_vars_lexer, TRUE);
00255 
00256   SYX_CLASS_CLASS_VARIABLES(subclass) = syx_dictionary_new (SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE (class_vars) + 10); 
00257 
00258   /* translate from array to dictionary */
00259   for (i=0; i < SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(class_vars); i++)
00260     syx_dictionary_at_symbol_put (SYX_CLASS_CLASS_VARIABLES(subclass),
00261                                   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(class_vars)[i], syx_nil);
00262   /* get rid of this */
00263   syx_object_free (class_vars);
00264 
00265   return TRUE;
00266 }
00267 
00268 syx_bool
00269 syx_cold_parse_methods (SyxLexer *lexer)
00270 {
00271   SyxToken token;
00272   SyxOop klass;
00273   SyxParser *parser;
00274   SyxLexer *method_lexer;
00275   /*syx_symbol category; */
00276   syx_string chunk;
00277   SyxLexer saved_lexer = *lexer;
00278 
00279   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00280   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST)
00281     {
00282       *lexer = saved_lexer;
00283       return FALSE;
00284     }
00285 
00286   klass = syx_globals_at (token.value.string);
00287   syx_token_free (token);
00288 
00289   if (SYX_IS_NIL (klass))
00290     return FALSE;
00291 
00292   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00293   if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST && !strcmp (token.value.string, "class"))
00294     {
00295       klass = syx_object_get_class (klass);
00296       syx_token_free (token);
00297       token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00298     }
00299 
00300   if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON && !strcmp (token.value.string, "methodsFor:")))
00301     {
00302       *lexer = saved_lexer;
00303       return FALSE;
00304     }
00305   syx_token_free (token);
00306 
00307   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00308   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_STR_CONST)
00309     {
00310       *lexer = saved_lexer;
00311       return FALSE;
00312     }
00313 
00314   /*  category = syx_strdup (token.value.string); */
00315   syx_token_free (token);
00316 
00317   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00318   if (!_IS_EXL_MARK (token))
00319     {
00320       *lexer = saved_lexer;
00321       return FALSE;
00322     }
00323   syx_token_free (token);
00324 
00325   if (SYX_IS_NIL (SYX_CLASS_METHODS (klass)))
00326     {
00327       SYX_CLASS_METHODS(klass) = syx_dictionary_new (50);
00328     }
00329 
00330   while (TRUE)
00331     {
00332       chunk = syx_lexer_next_chunk (lexer);
00333       method_lexer = syx_lexer_new (chunk);
00334       if (!method_lexer)
00335         break;
00336 
00337       parser = syx_parser_new (method_lexer, syx_method_new (), klass);
00338       syx_parser_parse (parser, FALSE);
00339 
00340       syx_dictionary_at_symbol_put (SYX_CLASS_METHODS(klass),
00341                                     SYX_METHOD_SELECTOR(parser->method),
00342                                     parser->method);
00343 
00344       syx_parser_free (parser, TRUE);
00345     }
00346   
00347   return TRUE;
00348 }
00349 
00355 syx_bool
00356 syx_cold_parse (SyxLexer *lexer)
00357 {
00358   SyxToken token;
00359   syx_bool parseOk = TRUE;
00360 
00361   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00362   while (parseOk && token.type != SYX_TOKEN_END)
00363     {
00364       if (_IS_EXL_MARK (token))
00365         parseOk = syx_cold_parse_methods (lexer);
00366       else
00367         parseOk = _syx_cold_parse_class (lexer);
00368 
00369       syx_token_free (token);
00370       token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
00371     }
00372   
00373   syx_token_free (token);
00374   return parseOk;
00375 }
00376 
00382 syx_bool
00383 syx_cold_file_in (syx_symbol filename)
00384 {
00385   SyxLexer *lexer;
00386   syx_string buffer;
00387   syx_int32 fd, count;
00388   syx_size size;
00389 #ifdef HAVE_FSTAT
00390   struct stat statbuf;
00391 #endif
00392 
00393   if ((fd = open (filename, O_RDONLY)) < 0)
00394      {
00395         syx_error ("can't open %s\n", filename);
00396         return FALSE;
00397      }
00398 #ifdef HAVE_FSTAT
00399   if ((fstat (fd, &statbuf)) < 0)
00400      {
00401         syx_error ("can't obtain size of %s\n", filename);
00402         return FALSE;
00403      }
00404   size = statbuf.st_size;
00405 #else
00406   size = 1000000;
00407 #endif
00408 
00409   buffer = (syx_string) syx_malloc (size + 1);
00410   count = read (fd, buffer, size);
00411   buffer[count - 1] = '\0';
00412    
00413   close (fd);
00414    
00415   lexer = syx_lexer_new (buffer);
00416   if (!lexer)
00417     {
00418       syx_free (buffer);
00419       return FALSE;
00420     }
00421 
00422   if (!syx_cold_parse (lexer))
00423     {
00424       syx_lexer_free (lexer, TRUE);
00425       return FALSE;
00426     }
00427 
00428   syx_lexer_free (lexer, TRUE);
00429   return TRUE;
00430 }
00431 
00432 /* Utilities to interact with Smalltalk */
00433 
00435 SyxOop
00436 syx_send_unary_message (SyxOop receiver, syx_symbol selector)
00437 {
00438   SyxOop context;
00439   SyxOop klass;
00440   SyxOop method;
00441 
00442   klass = syx_object_get_class (receiver);
00443   method = syx_class_lookup_method (klass, selector);
00444   if (SYX_IS_NIL (method))
00445     syx_error ("Unable to lookup method #%s in class %p (%s)\n", selector,
00446                SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (klass),
00447                SYX_IS_NIL (SYX_CLASS_NAME(klass))
00448                ? NULL
00449                : SYX_OBJECT_STRING (SYX_CLASS_NAME(klass)));
00450 
00451   context = syx_method_context_new (method, receiver, syx_nil);
00452   return context;
00453 }
00454 
00456 SyxOop
00457 syx_send_binary_message (SyxOop receiver, syx_symbol selector, SyxOop argument)
00458 {
00459   SyxOop context;
00460   SyxOop klass;
00461   SyxOop method;
00462   SyxOop arguments;
00463 
00464   klass = syx_object_get_class (receiver);
00465   method = syx_class_lookup_method (klass, selector);
00466   if (SYX_IS_NIL (method))
00467     syx_error ("Unable to lookup method #%s in class %p (%s)\n", selector,
00468                SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (klass),
00469                SYX_OBJECT_BYTE_ARRAY (SYX_CLASS_NAME(klass)));
00470 
00471   arguments = syx_array_new_size (1);
00472   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(arguments)[0] = argument;
00473   context = syx_method_context_new (method, receiver, arguments);
00474 
00475   return context;
00476 }
00477 
00483 SyxOop
00484 syx_send_message (SyxOop receiver, syx_symbol selector, syx_varsize num_args, ...)
00485 {
00486   SyxOop context;
00487   va_list ap;
00488 
00489   va_start (ap, num_args);
00490   context = syx_vsend_message (receiver, selector, num_args, ap);
00491   va_end (ap);
00492 
00493   return context;
00494 }
00495 
00496 
00503 SyxOop
00504 syx_vsend_message (SyxOop receiver, syx_symbol selector, syx_int32 num_args, va_list ap)
00505 {
00506   syx_varsize i;
00507   SyxOop context;
00508   SyxOop klass;
00509   SyxOop method;
00510   SyxOop arguments;
00511 
00512   if (num_args == 0)
00513     return syx_send_unary_message (receiver, selector);
00514 
00515   klass = syx_object_get_class (receiver);
00516   method = syx_class_lookup_method (klass, selector);
00517   if (SYX_IS_NIL (method))
00518     syx_error ("Unable to lookup method #%s in class %p (%s)\n", selector,
00519                SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (klass),
00520                SYX_OBJECT_BYTE_ARRAY (SYX_CLASS_NAME(klass)));
00521 
00522   arguments = syx_array_new_size (num_args);
00523   for (i=0; i < num_args; i++)
00524     SYX_OBJECT_DATA(arguments)[i] = va_arg (ap, SyxOop);
00525 
00526   context = syx_method_context_new (method, receiver, arguments);
00527 
00528   return context;
00529 }

00531 
00532 
00538 SyxOop
00539 syx_file_in_blocking (syx_symbol file)
00540 {
00541   SyxOop context;
00542   SyxOop process;
00543 
00544   process = syx_process_new ();
00545   context = syx_send_binary_message (syx_globals_at ("FileStream"),
00546                                      "fileIn:",
00547                                      syx_string_new (file));
00548   syx_interp_enter_context (process, context);
00549   syx_process_execute_blocking (process);
00550   return SYX_PROCESS_RETURNED_OBJECT (process);
00551 }
00552 
00553 
00559 SyxOop
00560 syx_do_it_blocking (syx_symbol code)
00561 {
00562   SyxOop context;
00563   SyxOop process;
00564 
00565   process = syx_process_new ();
00566   context = syx_send_unary_message (syx_string_new (code), "doIt");
00567   syx_interp_enter_context (process, context);
00568   syx_process_execute_blocking (process);
00569   return SYX_PROCESS_RETURNED_OBJECT (process);
00570 }
00571 
00572 
00574 syx_wstring
00575 syx_to_wstring (syx_symbol s)
00576 {
00577   syx_size size = strlen (s);
00578   syx_wstring ws = (syx_wstring) syx_calloc (size+1, sizeof (wchar_t));
00579   mbstowcs (ws, s, size);
00580   return ws;
00581 }
00582 
00584 syx_string
00585 syx_to_string (syx_wsymbol ws)
00586 {
00587   syx_size size = wcslen (ws);
00588   syx_string s = (syx_string) syx_calloc (size+1, sizeof (syx_char));
00589   wcstombs (s, ws, size);
00590   return s;
00591 }
00592 
00594 syx_uint32
00595 syx_find_first_non_whitespace (syx_symbol string)
00596 {
00597   syx_uint32 i;
00598   for (i=0; *(string+i); i++)
00599     {
00600       if (!isspace (*(string+i)))
00601         return i;
00602     }
00603 
00604   return 0;
00605 }
00606 
00608 void
00609 syx_show_traceback (void)
00610 {
00611   SyxInterpState *es;
00612   SyxInterpFrame *frame, *homeframe;
00613   syx_symbol traceformat;
00614   SyxOop classname;
00615   syx_symbol extraclass;
00616   SyxOop receiver;
00617 
00618   if (!syx_memory)
00619     {
00620       puts ("Can't print the memory state");
00621       return;
00622     }
00623 
00624   es = &_syx_interp_state;
00625   frame = es->frame;
00626 
00627   puts ("Memory state:");
00628   printf("Memory size: %d\n", _syx_memory_size);
00629   printf("Freed memory top: %d\n", _syx_freed_memory_top);
00630   if (!_syx_memory_gc_trans_running)
00631     puts ("No GC transaction");
00632   else
00633     printf("GC transaction top: %d\n", _syx_memory_gc_trans_top);
00634 
00635   if (!es)
00636     {
00637       puts ("Can't print the execution state");
00638       return;
00639     }
00640 
00641   puts ("\nExecution state:");
00642   printf("Process: %p (memory index: %ld)\n",
00643          SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (syx_processor_active_process),
00644          SYX_MEMORY_INDEX_OF (syx_processor_active_process));
00645   printf("Frame: %p\n", (syx_pointer) frame);
00646 
00647   if (!frame)
00648     return;
00649 
00650   printf("Receiver: %p (memory index: %ld)\n",
00651          SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (frame->receiver),
00652          SYX_MEMORY_INDEX_OF (frame->receiver));
00653   printf("Arguments: %p\n", (syx_pointer) es->arguments);
00654   printf("Temporaries: %p\n", (syx_pointer) es->temporaries);
00655   printf("Stack: %p\n", (syx_pointer) frame->stack);
00656   printf("Literals: %p\n", (syx_pointer) es->method_literals);
00657   printf("Bytecodes: %p (size: %d)\n", (syx_pointer) es->method_bytecodes, es->method_bytecodes_count);
00658   printf("Byteslice: %d\n", es->byteslice);
00659   printf("Instruction pointer: %p\n", (syx_pointer) frame->next_instruction);
00660   printf("Stack pointer: %p\n", (syx_pointer) frame->stack);
00661   printf("Message receiver: %p (memory index: %ld)\n",
00662          SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (es->message_receiver),
00663          SYX_MEMORY_INDEX_OF (es->message_receiver));
00664   printf("Message arguments: %p (size: %d)\n",
00665          (syx_pointer) es->message_arguments,
00666          es->message_arguments_count);
00667 
00668   if (SYX_IS_NIL (frame->detached_frame))
00669     printf("Process offset: %d\n", SYX_POINTERS_OFFSET (frame, SYX_OBJECT_DATA (SYX_PROCESS_STACK (_syx_interp_state.process))));
00670 
00671   puts ("\nTraceback:");
00672   while (frame)
00673     {
00674       if (frame->outer_frame)
00675         {
00676           homeframe = frame->outer_frame;
00677           while (homeframe->outer_frame)
00678             homeframe = homeframe->outer_frame;
00679           traceformat = "%s%s>>%s[]\n";
00680         }
00681       else
00682         {
00683           homeframe = frame;
00684           traceformat = "%s%s>>%s\n";
00685         }
00686 
00687       receiver = frame->receiver;
00688       classname = SYX_CLASS_NAME(syx_object_get_class(receiver));
00689       if (SYX_IS_NIL (classname))
00690         {
00691           classname = SYX_CLASS_NAME(SYX_METACLASS_INSTANCE_CLASS(syx_object_get_class(receiver)));
00692           extraclass = " class";
00693         }
00694       else
00695         extraclass = "";
00696 
00697       printf (traceformat,
00698               SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL(classname),
00699               extraclass,
00700               SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL(SYX_METHOD_SELECTOR(homeframe->method)));
00701 
00702       frame = frame->parent_frame;
00703     }
00704 }
00705
Documented by Luca Bruno and ScaccoMatto
